chart_description: The System Processes State chart shows the current state of the processes on the system. It provides information on the number of processes in various states such as running, sleeping_interruptible, sleeping_uninterruptible and zombie.

dimension_descriptions.running: The number of processes currently running on the system.
dimension_descriptions.sleeping_interruptible: The number of processes that are sleeping and can be interrupted
dimension_descriptions.sleeping_uninterruptible: The number of processes that are sleeping and cannot be interrupted until I/O operations are completed
dimension_descriptions.zombie: The number of zombie (defunct) processes on the system that have completed their execution but are still present in the process table.
